title: Summer Olympics Events
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 254 words, Level K (Grade 2), Lexile 530L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     H and Q		                 
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     H and Q		                 
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     H and Q
description: Summer Olympics Events is an informational book that describes some of the sports in which athletes compete during the Summer Olympic Games. Readers will learn about different types of water sports, gymnastics, and track and field events. Photographs help students make text-to-picture connections. Book and lesson also available at Levels H and Q.
meta: athletes, compete, dashes, gymnasts, marathon, stroke
Connect to prior knowledge to understand a nonfiction text
Plural Nouns : Identify and create plural nouns
Concept Words : Understand and identify number words

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
